annotation.text: A graph of two intersecting functions
A curve labeled f of x that crosses g in two places. Between the x values a and b, it lies above g
A curve labeled g of x that crosses f in two places. Between the x values a and b, it lies below g
The area above g and below f, which starts at a on the left and ends at b on the right, is shaded dark gray
The area below g and above the x-axis, which starts at a on the left and ends at b on the right, is shaded light gray
A tickmark on the x-axis below the first point of intersection is labeled a
A tickmark on the x-axis below the second point of intersection is labeled b
